14032.「私は けがれの渦の 動きを封じる！\n お前は ヤツの息の根を 止めるのだ！:
I will stop the Epidemex from moving! You will
choke the life out of him!

14033.「我は死……。\n 生きとし生けるもの すべての死。: I am death... the death of all living things.

14034.「お前たちの身体を使って\n 我は 世に まいもどるとしよう……。\n さあ 死:
I will use your bodies to carry my burden to
the world... and now you may die...

14036.「私は けがれの渦の 動きを封じる！\n お前は 今度こそ\n ヤツの息の根を:
I will stop the Epidemex from moving! This
time, you will choke him to death!

14037.「運よく 我が手を逃れながら \n ふたたび 戻るとは 愚かなり。:
It would be foolish to return again after
having so luckily escaped from my hands.

14038.「お前たちの身体を使って\n 我は 世に まいもどるとしよう……。\n さあ 死:
I will use your bodies to carry my burden to
the world... and now you may die...

14040.「これで…… 死神の息吹を 滅ぼせたのだな。\n よく やってくれた……。:
Now... you have destroyed the breath of the
Reaper. You have done well...

14041.「出会った時から わかっていた。\n お前は 人とはちがう\n 特別なチカラを持:
I knew from the moment I met you. I knew from
the moment I met you that you were different
from others, that you had a special power...

14042.「……<cs_pchero>。\n なぜ 大僧侶キリカは 閃香樹で\n エルドナ:
...<cs_pchero>. Why did High Priest Kirika
make the Idol of Eldona out of a sparkling
tree?

14043.「私は 思うのだ……。大僧侶キリカは \n お前のような者が 現れると信じ\n:
I think that the High Priestess Kirika
entrusted her future to that statue, believing
that someone like you would emerge.

14044.「そうして 教えたかったのかもしれない。\n 本当の神の心を。僧侶のあるべき姿を:
Maybe that's how he wanted to teach them. The
true heart of God. What a priest should be...

14045.「さあ…… 帰ろう。\n キリカ修道会の皆が 待っている。:
Let's go home. The Kirika order is waiting for
us.

14047.「おお……よく 無事に帰ってくれました。 \n これで 二度と 死神の息吹が\n:
Oh...thank you for your safe return. Now the
breath of the Reaper will never again appear
in this world.

14049.「これは 大僧侶キリカが残した 僧侶の証です。\n あなたが持つに ふさわしいも:
This is the Proof of PRI left by the High
Priest Kirika. You deserve to have it. Please
accept it.

14050.「これは 大僧侶キリカが残した品です。\n あなたが持つに ふさわしいものでしょ:
It was left to me by the great priest Kirika.
You deserve to have it. Please accept it.

14051.「あなたは 本当の僧侶の道を教えてくれました。\n 私たちは この教えを\n 永:
You have taught me the way of a true priest.
Let us perpetuate this teaching.

14053.「お前は もう私の弟子ではない。\n そのチカラも 心も……\n 私は お前に:
You are no longer my disciple. I am no match
for you in power or mind.

14054.「これからは 修道会を出て\n 自分のチカラで 高みを目指せ。\n お前は さら:
From now on, leave the monastery and aim high
with your own strength. You will become an
even better priest.

14055.「私は これからは もっと\n アルノーのそばに いてやるつもりだ。: I intend to be around Arnoud more from now on.

14056.「ありがとう <pc>。\n お前のことは 決して 忘れない。\n いつか また:
Thank you <pc>. I will never forget
you. See you again someday!

32319.「ボクね お母さんと ひさしぶりに\n お父さんの お墓参りに行ったの。\n う:
My mom and I went to visit my father's grave
for the first time in a while. We walked a
long way and I'm exhausted.

32320.<if_woman>「これからは お母さんと\n 世界中の いろんな所をまわるん:
From now on, I'm going to travel around the world with my mom. I'm going to travel around like you! Mom and
I are going to travel all over the world. I'm going to travel like Niichan!
